title: Tryndamere is broken and makes me want to quit LoL
body:
DUDE HE JUST SPLIT PUSHES ALL DAY AND THERE'S NOTHING YOU CAN DO. HOW IS THIS FAIR, RIOT.

He can 1v5, does so much damage, can heal, has invincible ultimate, even escape so you can't catch him because he's too fast. He makes me want to quit.

Tryndamere is one of the reasons Silver elo is so hard because people abuse his brokeness. If it weren't for him, Diamond's population would be much higher.

replies.body: 10/10 Quality shitpost.
I had to double check that this wasn't memes and games.
he's still "trolling" regardless. that's pretty much all he does.

Memes and games, Gameplay...

Honestly, what's the difference anymore

Either you are downvoted in gameplay, or become popular enough to become a meme
Same here.  The OP would be much better posting this in M&G rather than Gameplay.
Wait why don't you play him?

> [{quoted}](name=curtin123456,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3ls3jFsi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-04T03:01:25.711+0000)
>
> Wait why don't you play him?

because i have dignity
Why have dignity there a 99% chance if you get that easy freelo you will never see them so it doesn't matter
Same reason I won't lock in {{champion:17}}.
Wait, this isn't in Memes and Games?
{{champion:17}} keep him company at top
Good trynd can beat a teemo. And teemo is a fucking garbage pick anyways.

> [{quoted}](name=XTRMN00B1337,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3ls3jFsi,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-03-04T03:37:23.283+0000)
>
> Good trynd can beat a teemo.

No, lol.

A Teemo that takes ignite is pretty much unassailable for a Tryndamere. Trynd's only hope is to play extremely safely and try to outscale, but Tryndamere's mid game when he's behind is poopy dog shit, so he will likely lose the game for his team.

edit: On the other hand, maybe if Tryndamere took exhaust...
Teemo runs ignite?

> [{quoted}](name=XTRMN00B1337,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3ls3jFsi,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-04T04:32:36.787+0000)
>
> Teemo runs ignite?

Well, yes.

Teemo is an inherently selfish pick, why pretend that you're going to be helping your team? Much like Tryndamere actually. Tryndamere typically runs with ignite or sometimes exhaust.

I play teemo and carry games.  I have never honestly made a selfish pick with Teemo.  Though I use him as a "Nuclear Defense" in team fights, I stick close to my ADC and I protect them with 650 AP Q's and grenade Rs.  Also, only a trash teemo takes ignite.... Teleport gives you the ability to save objectives and team mates.  Its invaluable to a good Teemo.
Assuming the jungler is half competent, that teemo gonna die

> [{quoted}](name=Spicy Rice,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3ls3jFsi,comment-id=000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-04T04:43:49.634+0000)
>
> Assuming the jungler is half competent, that teemo gonna die

And then Teemo will come back to lane and continue to bully the shit out of Tryndamere, possibly killing him with ignite. In fact, ganking might be a bad idea because Tryndamere will be so low health he will be Q>AA>ignited for the kill when he tries to follow up. The match-up is that slanted in Teemo's favor.
If it's khazix he's just gonna oneshot teemo lol

> [{quoted}](name=PermabannedGaren,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3ls3jFsi,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2017-03-04T04:09:17.005+0000)
>
> No, lol.
> 
> A Teemo that takes ignite is pretty much unassailable for a Tryndamere. Trynd's only hope is to play extremely safely and try to outscale, but Tryndamere's mid game when he's behind is poopy dog shit, so he will likely lose the game for his team.
> 
> edit: On the other hand, maybe if Tryndamere took exhaust...

Well according to the two top Tryndamere players on NA (BoxerPete and Foggedftw1 and 2), you can beat a Teemo. Only thing is you have to do it at level 1 or 2. If you can't, then you have to play safe and just outscale. If you die and fall behind, you can't do anything. A decent Tryndamere player can easily beat a Teemo if the Teemo player isn't good with Teemo (which a lot of people do because they think it's a hard counter).

> [{quoted}](name=My IGN Sucks,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3ls3jFsi,comment-id=0002000000000001,timestamp=2017-03-04T04:45:16.334+0000)
>
> Well according to the two top Tryndamere players on NA (BoxerPete and Foggedftw1 and 2), you can beat a Teemo. Only thing is you have to do it at level 1 or 2. If you can't, then you have to play safe and just outscale. If you die and fall behind, you can't do anything. A decent Tryndamere player can easily beat a Teemo if the Teemo player isn't good with Teemo (which a lot of people do because they think it's a hard counter).

Yes, I am aware of the very narrow window of opportunity to beat Teemo through cheesing him at levels one or two, but see, you say that a decent Trynd can easily beat Teemo if the Teemo player isn't good at Teemo?

Uhhh, so what, lol?

Why are we using an example of a good Trynd against a bad Teemo as relevant when discussing how the champion's kits interact in laning?

If the Teemo is actually good at Teemo and knows how to play him there is very little that Tryndamere can do but try to play safe and outscale. Good Teemo players typically aren't dumb enough to get cheesed at level 1 or 2.
Wait are you inferring you would be Diamond if you got out of silver XD
nerf yi plz

Don't like how no matter how bad a Trynd does in lane, all he needs is a few items and now he's a threat since he can just ult, spin in, and dish out good damage before dying. If he gets fed then you're probably screwed lol. I mean, once I was 14/8 with Xayah and the 8/11 Trynd comes up to me, spins to me and auto attacks me under tower and I DIED. Literally that was 2000 damage in under a second. I don't feel safe with champions that can 2 shot the adc running around. ({{champion:45}} says hi)
{{champion:10}}

LOL I just made a post about this, he is honestly bullshit. He has need changes for years and Riot just hasn't given him any. His ultimate is pure bullshit, the fact that he can kill you when you play a tank, under tower at level 6 just because of his free crits is honestly fucking bullshit. litterally got 100-0 under tower by a trynd just because he crit me like 5 times in a row.
Tryndamere doesn't 1v5 lol. Otherwise somewhat valid complaints.

Meanwhile last season there was only one Tryn player in challenger in NA


Yeah, real broken. No, he just beats people that don't know what to do against him. So lemme tell what to do, group as 5, kill his team that he neglects, and outpush him because 5 people push faster than 1.
